At the time of writing seven predictions have been submitted. It is very early, but so far Philipp seems to be voicing the wisdom of the Covid-friendly crowd.

```{r intro, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE , warning=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(igraph)

cormat <- tbl_df(read.csv("cormat.csv", sep=";", header = FALSE, stringsAsFactors=FALSE))

cormat$V4 <- ifelse(cormat$V3 > 0.55, 1, 0)

cormat <- rename(cormat, "Korr" = "V3")

el <- cormat %>% filter(V4 == 1) %>% filter(V1 != V2)
el <- el[1:2]

plot.igraph(graph.edgelist(as.matrix(el)), layout = layout_with_fr(graph.edgelist(as.matrix(el))), vertex.label.cex=2)

```
